content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > you are very welcome to join the sweet > bee crochet facebook community share > photos of your crochet projects and > connect with other makers in a > positive and encouraging environment > click here 1 the two skein granny row wrap is made with lion brand mandala yarn and your favourite 5mm crochet hook it uses the basic stitches to create an easy and repetitive wrap project it has a lovely appeal that is created by crocheting the classic granny look with solid segments in between the completed size measures approximately 63 ½ inches long and 18 inches wide it s lightweight but cozy and displays a lovely soft drape as it hangs over your shoulders this pattern uses lion brand mandala yarn which comes in a variety of beautiful colourway options and creates a gorgeous striped finished piece **inside the pattern you will find ** detailed written instructions special stitch tutorial with instructional picture for stitch placement clear photos required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - 2 cakes of lion brand mandala approximately 1156 yards required i used griffin colourway - 5mm hook - measuring tape - yarn needle - scissors > this project is part of the granny > row collection view the other > patterns here > - one skein granny row scarf 2 > - one skein granny row neck warmer 3 this pattern has tested so you can feel confident in your purchase ***please note these are digital files and not finished products there will be no refunds on digital products *** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/one-skein-granny-row-scarf 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/one-skein-granny-row-neck-warmer
